sentences.en: Hermia was looking at him and wondering at his strange inconstancy.
sentences.cn: 赫米亚望着他,对他莫名其妙的反复无常感到很惊奇.

sentences.en: In contrast, inconstancy often results in failure.
sentences.cn: 反之, 反复多变往往导致失败.

sentences.en: Inconstancy is the cause of disaster, which results in separation and death.
sentences.cn: 无常意味着灾难, 它所导致的结果就是生离死别.

sentences.en: Inconstancy of life is the constant theme in Chinese and Japanese literary classics.
sentences.cn: 摘要感叹人生无常是中日两国古典文学中常见的主题.

sentences.en: It must be a confession of his inconstancy and confirm their separation forever.
sentences.cn: 这无非是他那轻薄行为的招供,以及他们一诀永别的判决.

sentences.en: It's inconstancy, but not inability, that's to be feared.
sentences.cn: 不怕无能, 就怕无恒.

sentences.en: Its inconstancy and low gain makes that it is only present in 50 % of the subjects.
sentences.cn: 它的不稳定性和低获得性使它仅在50%的个体中存在.

sentences.en: Love of not dependable make the person remind of inconstancy quality food easily, hard long - last conservancy .
sentences.cn: 爱情的不可靠容易使人想起易变质食品, 难以 长久保存.

sentences.en: On the other hand, inconstancy often results in failure.
sentences.cn: 反之, 缺乏恒心常常导致失败.

sentences.en: The inherent factors that decide its multiplication are the features as fission , function inconstancy and rarity.
sentences.cn: 档案信息的使用特点———裂变性 、 效应不定性和稀缺性是决定档案信息增值的内在因素.

sentences.en: The perfume of this passionate plant may turn a maiden's head, hence wild honeysuckle is a symbol of inconstancy in love.
sentences.cn: 充满激情的忍冬所散发的香气令少女却步回首，因此野生忍冬象征着爱情的反复无常。

words.tran_cn: 变化无常的；易变的；多变的
